name: @magi-agi/mcp-server
description: MCP server for Magi Archive wiki - provides AI agents secure access to the Magi Archive knowledge base
author: Magi AGI Project

tools.name: get_card
tools.description: Fetch a card by name from the wiki

tools.name: search_cards
tools.description: Search for cards by query, type, or filters

tools.name: create_card
tools.description: Create a new card in the wiki

tools.name: list_children
tools.description: List all child cards of a parent card

tools.name: get_tags
tools.description: Get all tags or tags for a specific card

tools.name: search_by_tags
tools.description: Search for cards by tags with AND or OR logic

tools.name: get_relationships
tools.description: Get relationship information for a card

tools.name: validate_card
tools.description: Validate a card's tags and structure

tools.name: render_content
tools.description: Convert content between HTML and Markdown

tools.name: create_weekly_summary
tools.description: Generate weekly summary card combining wiki and repo activity
